Articles.Content:
Okay, so...

My mechjeb was working fine a few weeks ago, but now the landing menu will not show up, even when I rapidly check and uncheck the box like a moron. I think it may have gone out of the boundry of the window somehow, so Is there any way to center it or something? I can live with telling smart A.S.S. to hold me at retrograde and do the landing myself, but It\'s starting to get annoying XP

Just now, going for a screenshot of the problem, I noticed it happening to orbital operations, too.

If you look in the config file for MJ, you can see the window coords. If any of them are huge or negative, change them to a low and positive number so the will display on screen again.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
